pkgmetadata.longdescription: #### PyLibCheck was made byLove ‚ùå code ‚úÖ---### üéà„ÉªCode exampleExample of how you can use [pylibcheck](https://pypi.org/project/pylibcheck/)```pyimport pylibcheck, timeif pylibcheck.checkPackage("pyinstaller") == False: print("pyinstaller is not installed!") time.sleep(1) print("installing it for you!") pylibcheck.installPackage("pyinstaller")```
